projects.title: Information architecture revamp
projects.description:
This project involved identifying gaps and problems with the current information architecture of a Developer Portal and redesigning to make it scalable and easy to navigate. After evaluating other developer portals and frameworks, I based the information 
 architecture on the Di√°taxis framework. Since the repository for this project is not in public domain, I have not included further information. But if you are interested to hear about the approaches I took for the design, I'm happy to chat about it.

projects.title: Add more sections!
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.
